summary: Mario and Filippo are two twin brothers, the honorable one want to bring morality back into Italian political life, as president of the Commission for the investigation of corruption. The other brother is a cynical trickster.
cast: Vittorio Gassman|Lisa Gastoni|Adrienne Larussa|Ettore Mattia|Antonio Centa|Umberto D'Orsi|James Riley|Janine Hendy|Ennio Balbo|Giampiero Albertini|Fiorenzo Fiorentini|Eugene Walter|Christopher Hodge|Michel Bardinet|Marisa Fabbri|Antonella Della Porta|Donatella Ceccarello|Tullio Altamura|Guido Spadea|Leonardo De Fraia|Giuseppe Terranova|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Jimmy il Fenomeno|Ljiliana Paulovic|Pino Patti|Cesare Gelli|Lino Banfi|John Bartha|Francesco Di Federico|Ettore Geri|Alfonso Giganti|Paolo Paoloni|Jean Rougeul|Farhad Sadighi|Luca Sportelli
title: Yo soy la oveja negra
